summary:
Draco: I like blueberries.
Harry: ...
Harry: Is this important?
Draco: For our next date? Yes. For our marriage? Yes. For...
body:
Draco: I like blueberries.

Harry: …

Harry: Is this important?

Draco: For our next date? Yes. For our marriage? Yes. For raising our children? Yes. For life? Yes. For death? Maybe, I don’t know if death likes blueberries.

reblog.comment:

Harry: …

Harry: Is this important?

Draco: For our next date? Yes. For our marriage? Yes. For raising our children? Yes. For life? Yes. For death? Maybe, I don’t know if death likes blueberries.

trail.content_raw:
Draco: I like blueberries.

Harry: …

Harry: Is this important?

Draco: For our next date? Yes. For our marriage? Yes. For raising our children? Yes. For life? Yes. For death? Maybe, I don’t know if death likes blueberries.
trail.content:
Draco: I like blueberries.

Harry: …

Harry: Is this important?

Draco: For our next date? Yes. For our marriage? Yes. For raising our children? Yes. For life? Yes. For death? Maybe, I don’t know if death likes blueberries.

blog.name: lifted-the-lid
blog.title: I like men, women, and bands
blog.description:
Personal side blog of lokigodof.tumblr.com. (If I follow you, I will follow from lokigodof.) Years ago I used to write Depeche Mode fanfic on wouldlinger.tumblr.com. 
Expect rock/metal bands, movies, personal posts and opinions. Sometimes I'll make posts in Bulgarian. I'm a pacifist who usually disapproves of America's foreign policy, be warned. 
Bands: HIM, Europe, Depeche Mode, Amorphis, Opeth, Rammstein, Behemoth, Hozier, Diary of Dreams, Apocalyptica, The Rasmus, Whitesnake, Rick Springfield, Free, Judas Priest, Dio, Black Veil Brides, Disturbed, Ghost, Priest,  Manowar, Gamma Ray, Type 0 Negative, Steve Vai, Smokie, Uriah Heep, etc.

tags: look at the little boys in the picture
do you think they're not being abused?
summary:
A CATHOLIC group in Poland has incinerated dozens of 
"sacrilegious" items in a bizarre public burning ritual led by local...
caption:
A CATHOLIC group in Poland has incinerated dozens of “sacrilegious” items in a bizarre public burning ritual led by local priests.

The ‘SMS From Heaven Foundation’ (Fundacja SMS z Nieba) in the northern Polish city of Koszalin took to social media at the weekend to share images of clergymen and altar servants throwing books and other objects onto a fire pit.

The burning – which saw everything from Harry Potter books to symbols from other religions destroyed – took place in a public area of the city in full view of local residents, according to local news outlet WP.

Items burned included novels from the iconic fantasy series by British author J.K. Rowling, as well as a Hindu religious figurine of an elephant, an African mask, a 'Hello Kitty’ umbrella and yet more books from the Twilight saga by US writer Stephenie Meyer.

Facebook users reacted with outrage to the bizarre public ritual, even comparing the group’s actions to the book-burning tendencies of the Nazis.

One wrote: “I’d like to believe this is a joke… Seriously? Are people burning fantasy literature in the 21st century in some kind of sick ritual?!”

The incident comes as the Roman Catholic Church in Poland continues to be hit with clerical child sex abuse allegations akin to those that have emerged around the world in recent years.

Last month, the Polish episcopate admitted for the first time that nearly 400 clergy had sexually abused children and minors over the last three decades – reflecting findings published in February by a charity for clerical sex abuse victims.

source:

https://www.irishpost.com/news/catholic-priests-publicly-burn-harry-potter-books-hindu-symbols-sacrilegious-items-poland-165662

summary: JK Rowling has recently revealed that Gormlaith Gaunt (Isolt's aunt) wasn't a crazy pureblood fanatic after all. In fact she...
body: JK Rowling has recently revealed that Gormlaith Gaunt (Isolt’s aunt) wasn’t a crazy pureblood fanatic after all. In fact she wanted to end Slytherins bloodline, which is why she killed Isolt’s parents. She had planned to kill Isolt as well but couldn’t bring it over herself to kill a child so she took her in to monitor her closely.

summary: Quote: “See what I have become?” the face said. “Mere shadow and vapour ... I have form only when I can share another’s body ......
caption: Quote: “See what I have become?” the face said. “Mere shadow and vapour … I have form only when I can share another’s body … but there have always been those willing to let into their hearts and mind …” (Lord Voldemort in Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s Stone)

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, James Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

tags: i mean i see how you can confuse the two
summary: The conversation between my friends I overheard
body:
The conversation between my friends I overheard


- So who’s your favorite Lord of the Rings character?

- Oh, Aragorn!

- Really? I was always afraid of him as a kid.

- Why?

- Well he nearly killed Harry and his friend. But Hagrid was really sad when he died so I see what you mean.

reblog.comment:
The conversation between my friends I overheard

The other day, I was chatting about one of my favourite mythical creatures, the Griffin. My friend gave me a knowing nod and said, “ah, Harry Potter.”

(more…)

summary: Young!Sirius x reader - Deal Heyo may I ask for a young Sirius Black x Slytherin reader with "Your tie is crooked."?💕 - Anon❤️...
body:
Young!Sirius x reader - Deal

Heyo may I ask for a young Sirius Black x Slytherin reader with “Your tie is crooked.”?💕 - Anon❤️

Back against the tree you sighed heavily when you heard the tell tale signs of Severus getting picked on. Flicking your eyes up, James and Sirius were backing him up into the lake. 

You snapped the book shut, getting up and marched over. Before Severus could fall you grabbed his wrist and pulled him over to you.

“Are you alright?”

The boy nodded shyly, breaking free from your embrace.

“T..thank you..” he mumbled.

Nodding, you ushered him away. Sending the other four a nasty glare. Remus and Peter gulped backing up slowly. James and Sirius just smirked at you.

“James Potter, what to do with you Hm? Perhaps I shall tell Lily that you said nasty things about her?”

“You wouldn’t (Y/N).” He gasped.

“Wouldn’t I?”

James’ eyes went wide, he raised his hands and backed up. He knew you would do it, and you’d do it with no problem either. Next, you turned to Sirius.

“What about you Sirius Black? I’m sure your family wouldn’t appreciate if I started to spread rumours saying they were from you.”

“(Y/N)…” he warned.

Clicking your tongue at him, you walked closer. Raising your hands to his tie, Sirius didn’t move. He kept his gaze firmly on your face, a small blush dusting his cheeks.

“What are you doing?!” He snapped.

“Your tie is crooked.”

Once you were done you pat it down, taking a step back to admire how much better it looked. With a nod of your head you fixed your own tie and turned around, heading back to your reading spot.

Someone ran behind you, grabbing your hand they spun you around. Again, you came face to face with Sirius, this time he couldn’t make eye contact, his face unbelievablely red.

“Yes?”

“W…would you… maybe like to go to hogsmead with me?”

Sirius gave you a hopeful smile, blinking in shock you took a moment to register that one, he was stuttering, two, he was blush and three, he just asked you on a date.

“No.”

“W…what?! Why?!”

With a sigh, you ran your other hand down your face.

“Sirius, how many girls have you dated this year alone?”

“Uhm…”

“My point exactly, I’m not going to be one of those girls.”

Snatching your hand back, you crossed your arms and waited for him to say something.

“You won’t! I promise! I really like you, I have since first year… I just couldn’t ask you out. I know I have a bad reputation with girls but please? One date?”

You thought this over, one date didn’t sound too bad.

“Fine, one date. Under one condition.”

“Which is?”

Walking closer you harshly poked his chest.

“Leave Severus alone, the lot of you.”

Sirius held a look of disbelief but he nodded anyway. A wide smile spreading across his face, He leaned down and kissed your cheek.

“Deal, pick you up Saturday at 12!”

With that the boys ran off, leaving you to go back to reading with a spring in your step

TAGS:

Harry Potter: @darth-dorle @stiffinme

All: @sitkafay @havlindzk @drakelover78

blog.name: kittykatwriteystuff
blog.title: Fandom Writings
blog.description: Mae’s the name, writin’s the game. I write for a lot of different fandoms, but I won’t write smut. Feel free to send in requests, but please, no more than two or three prompts per request! And if you send a numbered prompt, please include the prompt with the number if possible. To find my master post while I figure out how to get the stupid link up here, go to my search bar and look up "master post" or "master list" or "mae's master list"!

summary: 5. "You ruined me!" Anyone of your choice, Harry Potter plz :)
question: 5. "You ruined me!" Anyone of your choice, Harry Potter plz :)
answer:
Title: Sirius Reads Books??

Prompt: “You ruined me!”

Ship: Sirius Black x reader

Warnings: shenanigans

A/N: this is set during the marauders era, around the sixth year of Hogwarts, and (Y/H) is “your house”, as in your Hogwarts house, just to clarify

You and your best friend Sirius Black were sitting in the (Y/H) common room with you reading a book aloud with his head in your lap as you ran your fingers through his hair instinctively and he munched on sweets he’d nabbed from the kitchens earlier.

After you had read two full scenes from Hamlet, Sirius sat up and dramatically declared, “You’ve ruined me!”

You looked up at him in surprise and then smirked, “How did I do that?”

“You’ve made me like books!”

“Did I now?” You ask, not believing him.

“Yes. Guess how many books I’ve read in the last week alone.”

“How many?”

“Twelve,” he declared proudly.

You raised an an eyebrow, “That so?”

“Yes! And Prongs won’t stop teasing me about it!”

“What have you read then?”

“Pride and Prejudice, Mansfield Park, Emma, Sense and Sensibility, Peter Pan, Treasure Islan-“

You cut him off, “You read books by Jane Austen?”

“I did. You started reading Pride and Prejudice to me and I just had to know if Mr. Darcy and Elizabeth got together! And then I couldn’t stop reading Jane Austen! And then the other day you started reading Shakespeare and so I read Romeo and Juliet, The Tragedy Of Julius Caesar, Macbeth, and Midsummer Night’s Dream.” Sirius said.

“Where’d you get the books?” You asked incredulously.

“Moony,” Sirius said, as though it should have been obvious.

“So if I ask Remus, he’ll back up your story?”

“Yep! One hundred percent.”

You closed Hamlet and turned to face him, “So what did you think?”

And the two of you stayed up talking about the books he had read for the rest of the night.

body:
To the Moon and Back

Thanks to the lovely http://hpfanfictionprompts.tumblr.com for the prompt used in this AU!

—-

Wolfstar AU ~ 2 

—-

Remus had fucked up.

Like seriously fucked up.

And he was so used to avoiding the word serious from the jokes his boyfriend made that he almost forgot it existed. But it was the only accurate descriptor for his current situation.

He found himself aimlessly wandering the streets of his hometown, his thoughts running wild. The sun was beginning to rise and illuminated Remus’ path. It was only when he walked into a tree that he realised that he had strayed far from the pathway and into the woods surrounding his house.

He sat down against the tree, resting his head in his hands and sighing. His chest started shaking and the tears started spilling. How could he have done that? He really was a monster.

The sun slowly kept rising and he was soon unable to stand the light shining into his eyes. It was too cheery. Too happy. So he stood up and wiped the tears off his cheeks with his hoodie sleeve. Sighing, he apparated to the Potter’s house where he knew his boyfriend was staying that summer. 

He knocked on the large oak front door and was met by a very sleepy and dishevelled James Potter who was still dressed in light blue rubber duck pyjamas. It was nothing new for Remus to see, who saw the boy every morning in their dorm room for the past 6 years. “What’s up, Moons?” he asked.

“I.. ah need Sirius,” he said, wiping the last tear off his cheek. James looked up at his friend properly and saw how distraught Remus was. He nodded and opened the door wider for Remus to enter.

“I think he’s still asleep. You know where his room is, right?” James said. Remus shook his head in agreement and walked up the Potter’s grand staircase. He walked down the elaborately decorated halls of the Potter manor until he reached the room that he knew that held Sirius.

He opened the door quietly and looked in at his sleeping boyfriend. He sat down on the edge of the large bed and patted Sirius, gently waking him up. “’ey Rems,” he said sleepily. “What’s up?”

“Last night it was the full moon and I must’nt’ve got out to the forest in time. When I woke up this morning all I saw was blood. There was so much Pads.” he said, sobbing as Sirius wrapped his arms around him, pulling him into his chest.

“I hurt my mum Pads. I’m a monster. I hurt her and when my dad came down and saw, he couldn’t look at me. I couldn’t look at me. I can’t stand myself.”

“Shhh, babe. It will be okay, okay? It’s not your fault, and you are not a monster, okay? You can’t control that part of you. I know you. You are not, and could never be, a monster to me, or to anyone else.”

“I almost killed her.” Remus sobbed.

“It wasn’t your fault. It was the wolf side of you. Your human side couldn’t hurt a fly. And that’s one of the reasons why I love you.” Sirius whispered to his boyfriend, kissing him on the top of his head.

“You… You love me?” Remus asked, tears still streaming down his face.

“I do. Because you’re amazing and kind and you couldn’t hurt a fly if you wanted to and you’re the smartest nerd I know and damn is it hot.”

He let out a laugh at the last part, smiling up at his adorably sleepy boyfriend. “I love you too, Pads. I love you so much.”

“Good, because I love you to the moon and back and nothing will ever change that.”

He knocked on the large oak front door and was met by a very sleepy and dishevelled James Potter who was still dressed in light blue rubber duck pyjamas. It was nothing new for Remus to see, who saw the boy every morning in their dorm room for the past 6 years. “What’s up, Moons?” he asked.

“I.. ah need Sirius,” he said, wiping the last tear off his cheek. James looked up at his friend properly and saw how distraught Remus was. He nodded and opened the door wider for Remus to enter.

“I think he’s still asleep. You know where his room is, right?” James said. Remus shook his head in agreement and walked up the Potter’s grand staircase. He walked down the elaborately decorated halls of the Potter manor until he reached the room that he knew that held Sirius.

He opened the door quietly and looked in at his sleeping boyfriend. He sat down on the edge of the large bed and patted Sirius, gently waking him up. “’ey Rems,” he said sleepily. “What’s up?”

“Last night it was the full moon and I must’nt’ve got out to the forest in time. When I woke up this morning all I saw was blood. There was so much Pads.” he said, sobbing as Sirius wrapped his arms around him, pulling him into his chest.

“I hurt my mum Pads. I’m a monster. I hurt her and when my dad came down and saw, he couldn’t look at me. I couldn’t look at me. I can’t stand myself.”

“Shhh, babe. It will be okay, okay? It’s not your fault, and you are not a monster, okay? You can’t control that part of you. I know you. You are not, and could never be, a monster to me, or to anyone else.”

“I almost killed her.” Remus sobbed.

“It wasn’t your fault. It was the wolf side of you. Your human side couldn’t hurt a fly. And that’s one of the reasons why I love you.” Sirius whispered to his boyfriend, kissing him on the top of his head.

“You… You love me?” Remus asked, tears still streaming down his face.

“I do. Because you’re amazing and kind and you couldn’t hurt a fly if you wanted to and you’re the smartest nerd I know and damn is it hot.”

He let out a laugh at the last part, smiling up at his adorably sleepy boyfriend. “I love you too, Pads. I love you so much.”

“Good, because I love you to the moon and back and nothing will ever change that.”

trail.content_raw:
To the Moon and Back

Thanks to the lovely http://hpfanfictionprompts.tumblr.com for the prompt used in this AU!

—-

Wolfstar AU ~ 2 

—-

Remus had fucked up.

Like seriously fucked up.

And he was so used to avoiding the word serious from the jokes his boyfriend made that he almost forgot it existed. But it was the only accurate descriptor for his current situation.

He found himself aimlessly wandering the streets of his hometown, his thoughts running wild. The sun was beginning to rise and illuminated Remus’ path. It was only when he walked into a tree that he realised that he had strayed far from the pathway and into the woods surrounding his house.

He sat down against the tree, resting his head in his hands and sighing. His chest started shaking and the tears started spilling. How could he have done that? He really was a monster.

The sun slowly kept rising and he was soon unable to stand the light shining into his eyes. It was too cheery. Too happy. So he stood up and wiped the tears off his cheeks with his hoodie sleeve. Sighing, he apparated to the Potter’s house where he knew his boyfriend was staying that summer. 

He knocked on the large oak front door and was met by a very sleepy and dishevelled James Potter who was still dressed in light blue rubber duck pyjamas. It was nothing new for Remus to see, who saw the boy every morning in their dorm room for the past 6 years. “What’s up, Moons?” he asked.

“I.. ah need Sirius,” he said, wiping the last tear off his cheek. James looked up at his friend properly and saw how distraught Remus was. He nodded and opened the door wider for Remus to enter.

“I think he’s still asleep. You know where his room is, right?” James said. Remus shook his head in agreement and walked up the Potter’s grand staircase. He walked down the elaborately decorated halls of the Potter manor until he reached the room that he knew that held Sirius.

He opened the door quietly and looked in at his sleeping boyfriend. He sat down on the edge of the large bed and patted Sirius, gently waking him up. “’ey Rems,” he said sleepily. “What’s up?”

“Last night it was the full moon and I must’nt’ve got out to the forest in time. When I woke up this morning all I saw was blood. There was so much Pads.” he said, sobbing as Sirius wrapped his arms around him, pulling him into his chest.

“I hurt my mum Pads. I’m a monster. I hurt her and when my dad came down and saw, he couldn’t look at me. I couldn’t look at me. I can’t stand myself.”

“Shhh, babe. It will be okay, okay? It’s not your fault, and you are not a monster, okay? You can’t control that part of you. I know you. You are not, and could never be, a monster to me, or to anyone else.”

“I almost killed her.” Remus sobbed.

“It wasn’t your fault. It was the wolf side of you. Your human side couldn’t hurt a fly. And that’s one of the reasons why I love you.” Sirius whispered to his boyfriend, kissing him on the top of his head.

“You… You love me?” Remus asked, tears still streaming down his face.

“I do. Because you’re amazing and kind and you couldn’t hurt a fly if you wanted to and you’re the smartest nerd I know and damn is it hot.”

He let out a laugh at the last part, smiling up at his adorably sleepy boyfriend. “I love you too, Pads. I love you so much.”

“Good, because I love you to the moon and back and nothing will ever change that.”
